# IDE Resources — Sub-Index

> Resources for IDEs and development tools used in Java development.

---

## Directory Structure

```
ide/
├── README.md                  ← you are here
└── intellij-idea-guide.md     ← IntelliJ IDEA comprehensive guide
```

## Quick Navigation

| Guide | Description | Topics |
|---|---|---|
| [IntelliJ IDEA Guide](intellij-idea-guide.md) | Complete reference for JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA | Setup, navigation, code assistance, debugging, profiling, refactoring, build tools, VCS, testing, Spring, plugins, shortcuts |
